articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Bureau of Civil Aviation of the DPRK headed by its Director General Kang Ki Sop left Pyongyang for Russia on Tuesday.

articles.title: Mosaic Portraying Smiling Kim Jong Il Erected in Kanggye City
articles.content:
Mosaic Portraying Smiling Kim Jong Il Erected in Kanggye City
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A mosaic "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" was erected in Kanggye City, Jagang Province.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the province several times in a year despite snowstorm, strong wind and heavy rain during the Arduous March, forced march, projecting ordinary working people as creators of the heroic Kanggye Spirit who made a breakthrough in the march and making a new history of great change in the province.
					
					 Thanks to the great loving care shown by Kim Jong Il medium and small-sized power stations were built everywhere, double and triple cropping became a reality in the alpine areas in the northern part of the country and worksites and villages were facelifted.
					
					 Party members and other working people in the province turned out as one in the project for erecting the mosaic with boundless yearning for Kim Jong Il and completed it in a brief span of time through their intense loyalty and devoted efforts.
					
					 Its unveiling ceremony took place on Tuesday.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Tuesday, the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 When the song "Please Receive the Best Wishes of People" resounded forth in the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and other places in Pyongyang, there began dancing parties.
					
					 They presented dances, keenly realizing that thanks to the experienced and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il, the WPK could inherit the bloodline of Mt. Paektu, pave the road of revolutionary party building in the era of independence and bring about an epoch-making turn. 
					
					 They presented dances to the tune of such songs as "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology" and "Youth Is Glorified Thanks to the WPK." They were proud of demonstrating the honor of being a reserve combat contingent and detached force of the supreme commander under the warm care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The festive atmosphere picked up when the band played songs including "Bonfire, Flare up", "Let's Meet Each Other on the Front" and "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party"
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in provincial seats on the same day.

articles.title: Art Performances Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK
articles.content:
Art Performances Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance was given by the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Tuesday to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It began with female solo and chorus "Ode to Comrade Kim Jong Il".
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as chorus "Party Represents Care of the General", mixed duet "Country under Party's Sunshine", female instrumental ensemble "Memories of the Road to Front", male quartet "Bonfire, Flare up" and female chorus "Yearning is Endless".
					
					 The performers sang highly of the undying feats of Kim Jong Il, who led the WPK along the road of victory with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and energetic leadership for nearly half a century since he started his work at the WPK.
					
					 The atmosphere of the performance reached its height when chorus "General Will Remain Forever as Sun" resounded throughout the auditorium.
					
					 Mixed duet and chorus "Our Leader Loved by People" and chorus "We Will Follow You with Single Mind" truthfully reflected the great pride and self-confidence of the army and people of the DPRK who have the dear respected Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Jong Il at the top posts of the WPK and revolution. 
					
					 Appreciating the performance were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee. Among the audience were officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and other people in Pyongyang.
					
					 There were other performances in Pyongyang by the National Symphony Orchestra, the National Folk Art Troupe, the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Pyongyang Circus at the People's Theatre, the National Theatre, etc. 
					
					 Local art troupes also gave performances in their provinces.

articles.title: Russians Help Farmers of DPRK
articles.content:
Russians Help Farmers of DPRK 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Alexandr Timonin and staff members of the Russian embassy here gave a helping hand to farmers of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Co-op Farm in Chollima District, Nampho City Tuesday.
					 After being briefed on the immortal leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in front of the monument to their revolutionary activities, they went round a room dedicated to the history of the farm.
					
					 Then they joined farmers in weeding a maize field.
					
					 During a break, they conversed with farmers and enjoyed an art performance given by schoolchildren there, deepening the friendship.
					
					 The staff members handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Rana Ornativentris Bred in DPRK
articles.content:
Rana Ornativentris Bred in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Rana ornativentris is bred in different areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Jang Sung Nam, a section chief of the Unphasan Trading Company.
					
					 Q: Medicines manufactured with Rana ornativentris drew deep attention at the 15th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair held in May last.
					
					 Would you like to tell me about the breeding of it?
					
					 A: With many valleys and streams, the country boasts of favorable conditions to breed Rana ornativentris.
					
					 This kind of frog inhabits in Mt. Oga in Jagang Province and deep valleys of South Hamgyong, Kangwon, North Hwanghae, North and South Phyongan provinces.
					
					 Half-artificial breeding has been under way in those mountains. Recently a technology of breeding it in an industrial way was introduced on the basis of insect feed and the seed problem settled, making it possible to breed it urban areas, too.
					
					 Q: Rana ornativentris is believed to be good material of medicine and health food. Can you tell me about it?
					
					 A: Rana ornativentris helps activate people's physical energy, promote lung activities and recover fatigue and wounds.
					
					 Q: Please tell me about the future of its breeding?
					
					 A: It is important to breed good seed accustomed to climatic and soil conditions. Feed is also crucial to breeding it.
					
					 Besides, breeding grounds should be built to suit the physiological features of Rana ornativentris and strict measures taken to prevent it from being affected by epidemics and natural enemies.
					
					 More than a hundred of thousands of Rana ornativentrises can be bred with less manpower. It takes only seven months to fully breed them.

articles.title: Wastes Turn Renewable in DPRK
articles.content:
Wastes Turn Renewable in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A dynamic drive is being conducted in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to turn wastes into renewable resources.
					 The Environment Protection Institute under the Ministry of Land and Environment Conservation succeeded in making quality organic fertilizer with sludge in the River Pothong. The Pothonggang Organic Compound Fertilizer Factory has already been built to go into full operation.
					
					 The City Management Institute under the State Academy of Sciences has developed heat-insulating materials and asphalt waterproof emulsion with urban and industrial wastes.
					
					 The heat-insulating materials, resistant to water and sound, are easy to make, giving no adverse effect on environment. The emulsion is highly effective in repairing roofs.
					
					 The Posan Iron Works has built a process of making industrial wastes renewable, in which it turns out hundreds of thousands of concrete blocks a year and collects dust coal in wastes to supplement households' fuel. It planted trees in the site piled with industrial wastes.
					
					 The Pyongyang Bearing Factory has made precision products by effective use of wastes and scrap iron.
					
					 The Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex applies scrap mica into making powder mica tapes.
					
					 Industrial establishments across the country are now striving to turn various kinds of wastes into renewable resources conducive to the economic construction.

articles.title: Drought Lingers in West Coastal Area of DPRK
articles.content:
Drought Lingers in West Coastal Area of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Some west coastal areas in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea witnessed not a small amount of rainfall on June 15-16.
					 According to date available at the Hydro-meteorological Service, 30 to 125 mm rainfalls were registered in most areas of North Phyongan Province.
					
					 It also rained in the western area of South Hwanghae Province and some areas of North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 But some areas are still affected by a long spell of drought. Most affected are some part of Pyongyang City, including Kangnam County, southwestern area of South Phyongan Province, Onchon area in Nampho City and western and southeastern areas in North Hwanghae Province, including Yonthan and Hwangju counties.
					
					 2 to 16 mm rainfalls were witnessed in northwestern and southern areas of South Hwanghae Province, including Haeju City and Anak County.
					
					 Rain is hardly expected for the western coastal area until June 26, affected by high pressure above the East Sea of Korea and the Sea of Okhotsk. The high pressure is likely to weaken on June 27 and 28.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Closes
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Closes
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The 15th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize closed with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall in the DPRK Tuesday. It was opened on June 11.
					 Competed there were Taekwon-do, Korean wrestling and Paduk (go) games.
					
					 The Kangwon Provincial Taekwon-do Team placed first in team standing.

articles.title: Workers' Party of Korea Called Motherly Party
articles.content:
Workers' Party of Korea Called Motherly Party
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- June 19 marks the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Since the start of his work at the party, he had conducted energetic activities to build up the WPK into a motherly party that takes care of the popular masses' destiny in a responsible manner. 
					
					 He set it as the basic principle of party building and activities and a matter affecting the very existence of the party to form a harmonious whole of the party and the popular masses, and properly combined the monolithic leadership of the party with the mass line.
					
					 He saw to it that the officials paid deep attention to public voice and faithfully and devotedly served the people to meet their demand and interests. 
					
					 Thanks to the all-embracing politics, the benevolent politics of the WPK, all the Korean people are leading a worthwhile political life.
					
					 The popular policies and great benevolence of the WPK for each household and individual brought a great reality in which all the people entrust their all to the party, always following it.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of the WPK, which settles any issue in reliance on the people, the army, the government, the economy and culture have developed into ones entirely for the people.
					
					 Rallied as one in mind around the WPK, all the people in the DPRK are now pushing ahead with the building of a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Development of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Development of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Forty-eight years has passed since leader Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 In the period he developed the WPK into the general staff of the Songun (military-first) revolution and remarkably enhanced its role.
					
					 He began his guidance over the Songun revolution with an inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tanks Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on August 25, 1960. 
					
					 On the basis of analysis into the prevailing situation and the demands of developing revolution in the 1990s, he defined the Songun politics as the basic mode of politics under socialism and as the WPK's mode of guidance over the revolution.
					
					 He thoroughly established the system of the WPK's leadership over the entire army and thus brought about a new turn in strengthening the KPA into an army serving for the party and the leader. Considering the KPA to be the main force in building the nation, he trained it to be the strong army of Mt. Paektu intensely loyal to the Party, playing a key role in the revolution and construction.
					
					 He saw to it that party organizations at all levels oriented their activities to implementing the idea and line of the Songun revolution and learned from the KPA's enterprising and fresh party political work. 
					
					 Thanks to his energetic guidance, the WPK emerged an ever-victorious party, backed by the KPA, and a strong party vibrant with the revolutionary soldier spirit and working style. The unity of the party, the people and the army around the headquarters of the revolution was cemented and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea turned into a full-fledged nuclear state and a military power.
					
					 The undying feats Kim Jong Il performed by setting an example in building a socialist ruling party shine as an eternal treasure in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Invincible and Iron-willed Commander
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Invincible and Iron-willed Commander
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un made public treatise titled "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" on April 20 to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 In the treatise, he stressed that the President is an invincible and iron-willed commander and military genius as he started and led the Korean revolution to victory with arms.
					
					 The Korean revolution has made steady progress in the acute military confrontation with the imperialist aggressors, including the two revolutionary wars.
					
					 Kim Il Sung launched the hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle under the slogan "Oppose arms with arms, and oppose counterrevolutionary violence with revolutionary violence!" and thus realized the historic cause of liberating the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule in Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 The Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953) was the fiercest war in the world history, and it was a great revolutionary war, a war of justice in which the Korean people reliably defended their country and the peace and security of the world under the wise command of the President.
					
					 The victory in the war was attributable to his distinguished military idea, stratagem and seasoned commanding art.
					
					 Kim Il Sung advanced the Juche-based military idea and theory in his early years and always won in fierce wars and showdown with the imperialists while directing big efforts to bolstering up the armed forces in the whole period of his life.
					
					 Reading the treatise, all the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea harden their will to remain faithful to the Songun (military-first) revolutionary cause guided by Kim Jong Un, with high pride and honor of being the nation that always emerged victorious under the leadership of Kim Il Sung, a peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Leading Party Building Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Leading Party Building Praised
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Papers Tuesday editorially observe the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK on June 19, 1964 was an epoch-making event of great significance in developing the WPK and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 He considered the party building as a fundamental issue in the revolution and energetically led the work to strengthen the WPK organizationally and ideologically and increase its leadership role in the whole period of leading the revolution, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 He laid it down as a fundamental principle governing the party building to ensure monolithic ideology and leadership and wisely led the struggle to develop the party into the party of the leader.
					
					 He developed the party into the one representing and protecting the wishes and interests of the popular masses and a mass party deeply rooted among broad masses and linked with them by kinship in the whole period of leading the revolution.
					
					 He put forward the Songun politics in the 1990s when the country faced a stern ordeal as the main political mode under socialism and developed the party into the political staff of the Songun revolution.
					
					 His immortal feats in the party building are being successfully carried forward by the idea and leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Thanks to his intense loyalty and sense of moral obligation, Kim Jong Il's feats are displaying ever greater vitality and attraction as the days go by.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the WPK will demonstrate its dignity as the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il thanks to the outstanding idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un and the army and the people who work hard like descendants of the President and disciples and soldiers of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates a bylined article to the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism". 
					 The work published on June 19, 1995 clearly teaches the historical truth that socialism is sure to triumph when ideology is grasped but fails, when it is neglected. It also clarifies the need to conduct ideological work, basic tasks, principles and ways for doing the work in socialist society. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker and theoretician who clearly indicated the way to be followed by socialism by enriching socialist ideas and theories with his rare wisdom, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Songun idea of President Kim Il Sung with unique principles and contents and comprehensively systemized them as required by the developing revolution. 
					
					 He strengthened the People's Army, the driving force of the revolution, politically and ideologically and firmly defended the socialist country and vigorously advanced the revolution and construction with its might. 
					
					 He projected the revolutionary soldier-spirit fully displayed among service personnel of the People's Army as the noble revolutionary spirit representing the Songun era and let the entire party and society learn from it. 
					
					 The more difficult tasks and more stern ordeals the country and the revolution faced, the more firmly Kim Jong Il believed in the ideological and mental power of the popular masses. Thanks to his leadership, a lot of monumental edifices sprung up in the country. 
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK is advancing full of dynamism at present. 
					
					 Korean-style socialism is sure to triumph thanks to the Workers' Party of Korea leading the revolution and construction the way Kim Jong Il did and the army and people who are devoting themselves to the cause of patriotism.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms U.S. Arch Criminal Harassing Global Peace, Stability
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms U.S. Arch Criminal Harassing Global Peace, Stability
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the United States sold military equipment worth over 2 million U.S. dollars to 60 countries each by FMS mode in the fiscal 2011 with the sales totaling 14.227 billion dollars.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This indicates that the "peace" and "reduction of international tensions" touted by the U.S. so far are no more than a hypocritical talk to deceive the international community and conceal its ill-natured intention.
					
					 The U.S. is crying out for "peace", "stable situation" and "detente" but it wants, in actuality, aggression, war and escalated tensions, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. munitions monopolies are exercising their influence in the political circles of the U.S., instigating them to harass peace and strain the situation in different parts of the world.
					
					 The U.S., in particular, is rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity extremely tense and massively shipping latest military hardware into them allegedly to cope with the non-existent "military threats" and "provocations" from the DPRK. One of its important aims is to bulge munitions monopolies' purse.
					
					 The U.S. sale of munitions has resulted in upsetting the equilibrium of force in various regions of the world and increasing the danger of war. The U.S.-made weapons are being used to kill many people.
					
					 It is not fortuitous that the world is cursing the U.S. dollar, saying it is stained with blood of human beings.
					
					 The U.S. deserves stern punishment of justice as an arch criminal harassing global peace and stability as it dampens the desire of humankind for peace and incites war and confrontation in different parts of the world, the commentary warns.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Conservative Media's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Conservative Media's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) --The south Korean paper Chosun Ilbo recently claimed "the north purchased military uniforms dog-cheap" and ridiculously linked this with expenses for the celebrations of the Day of the Sun.
					 Yonhap News craftily played down the DPRK's popular policy for the children, asserting that this is the "trend" of other country, etc.
					
					 South Korean Economic Daily also slandered the DPRK by reprinting a false story dealing with the reunion of separated families and relatives carried by a pseudo-medium operated by human scum who betrayed their homeland.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Absolutely intolerable are the south Korean conservative media's acts of persistently rattling the nerves of the DPRK and driving the north-south relations into a total collapse through false propaganda under the wire-pulling of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					
					 What the conservative media trumpeted is very disturbing outbursts intended to undermine the socialist system and single-mined unity of the DPRK and quell the south Korean people's desire for achieving reunification through alliance with the north as they are part of the evermore noisy campaign of the Lee group to escalate the confrontation of the social systems.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for Lee, tight-cornered after being hit hard from all sides, to divert public attention elsewhere and seek a way out by setting the conservative media in motion.
					
					 The tongue wounds more than a lance.
					
					 The DPRK has already declared its stand to mercilessly blow up the dens of the hideous provocateurs hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and doing harm to its ideology, social system and people by spreading all sorts of lies and misinformation.
					
					 The conservative media had better stop running wild, cogitating about the serious consequences to be entailed by such ceaseless provocations to the DPRK as malignant mud-slinging.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea to Hold Big Firepower Strike Drills
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea to Hold Big Firepower Strike Drills
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers plan to stage DPRK-targeted joint firepower strike drills in Phochon, Kyonggi Province on June 22.
					 The south Korean "Defense Ministry" announced this on June 18.
					
					 The prime minister of south Korea is said to spearhead the drills which will involve 38 units including a U.S. helicopter unit, mechanized and artillery brigades under the 5th army corps, units under the air operation command and several air force formations of south Korea.
					
					 The plan also envisages a drill of air supply of ammunition and food as well as airborne infiltration of commandoes for occupying positions.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Hit for Defaming Celebrations of KCU Anniversary
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Hit for Defaming Celebrations of KCU Anniversary 
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Political parties, organizations and institutions of Peru issued statements condemning the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea for defaming the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 The Socialist Party of Peru said: It is only the DPRK which projects the children as kings of the country. But traitor Lee Myung Bak seriously slandered Korean children, misinterpreting everything in the world.
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism noted: The Lee group defamed the celebrations of the KCU anniversary, likening it to the juvenile corps of fascist Hitler. This was a folly that could be done only by Lee, an imbecile and idiot ignorant of what the KCU is like.
					
					 The Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru denounced the Lee group for its provocative act of speaking ill of the Korean children.
					
					 The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea noted that the Heaven will not pardon the group of traitors for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, taking issue with the inviolable celebrations of Korean children.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship said the Lee group using even the celebrations of children for its anti-DPRK, anti-reunification moves is hordes of brutes which have no sense of shame.
					
					 The General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute and the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union noted that the Lee group of traitors which stretched their tentacles of provocation even to the naive children is the Hitler-like clique as it puts into the shade the Hitler barbarians who killed people, young and old, men and women, during World War II.
					
					 Meanwhile, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said that the south Korean authorities are not qualified to take issue with the DPRK's policy on education of children.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Forces under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Forces under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on June 1 to denounce the south Korean fascist authorities for their suppression of  progressive forces.
					 The Lee Myung Bak fascist regime searched the building of the Unified Progressive Party and confiscated the list of its party members, the joint statement said, adding this is the height of its hooliganism and is aimed at doing harm to progressive political parties and staying in power.
					
					 South Korea has turned into a dark land under the sway of fascism in which human rights are ruthlessly trampled down by the scandal-ridden Lee regime, it said.
					
					 All the facts clearly prove that the Lee regime is just like the Park Chung-Hee and Syngman Rhee puppet regimes, it noted, and continued:
					
					 Progressive mankind should properly see through the true colors of Lee Myung Bak, a fascist dictator and pro-U.S. lackey.
					
					 It urged the Lee regime to stop suppression of the Unified Progressive Party, set free immediately the arrested pro-reunification patriots including Rev. Han Sang Ryol and abolish the "Security Law".

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group's Racket for "Eliminating Forces Following North" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group's Racket for "Eliminating Forces Following North" Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" kicked off by the Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea is a fascist action to root out democratic forces of different circles calling for progress and reform.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The people from all walks of life disillusioned with the conservative policy of the Lee group are intensifying their actions to bring down the traitors' "government", chanting slogans "We can't endure any longer" and "Let's bring down the pragmatic dictatorial regime," the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Much upset by the conservative policy being shaken to its very foundation, the Lee group is making desperate efforts to bar the struggle against conservatism from mounting at any cost and shore up the corrupt U.S. colonial ruling system.
					
					 The Lee group is labeling those who support the policy of the north, opposed to its talk about legitimacy, and justify the north as the "forces following the north."
					
					 The real aim sought by the Lee group is to block the advance of progressive and pro-reform forces getting dynamic in south Korea due to its "coloring" operation and ideological conflict and render society more conservative and reactionary.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak and conservative group of the "Saenuri Party" are resorting to their trite "coloring" operation aimed at labeling the progressive and pro-reform forces as the "leftists" linked with the DPRK under the watchword of eliminating the "forces following the north" in a bid to turn the situation before the "presidential election" favorable to them.
					
					 The Lee group is working hard to use the watchword for misleading public and seek the stay of the conservative regime in power but this will get it nowhere.
					
					 The racket would only bring into bolder relief the wicked nature and intention of the group and precipitate the final destruction of the conservative regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Cracking Down upon Members of Pomminryon
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Cracking Down upon Members of Pomminryon
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea has recently passed judgment on incumbent and former officials of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon). Its Chairman Ri Kyu Jae was sentenced to one year in prison, former Secretary General Ri Kyong Won four years and former Information Chairperson Choe Un A two years and six months in jail.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 To crack down upon members of Pomminryon linking them with the DPRK is just an undisguised provocation against the DPRK and a reckless act against the nation and reunification, which escalates confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors imposed penalties on the members, far from supporting and encouraging their righteous activities. This is rowdyism just like treachery doing harm to patriotism, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 South Koreans are now harshly critical of the group's unjust trial of the Pomminryon members, countering the traitors' racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" with the call for "removing the forces following the U.S."
					
					 Their call is a revelation of will to bring about new policy and new life by shattering the conspiratorial "theory of the forces following the north" touted by the group of traitors.
					
					 The group of traitors should release the unreasonably detained members of Pomminryon at an early date, ensure freedom in the movement for reunification and roll back at once the tricky racket for "eliminating the forces following the north", clearly facing up to the people's mind-set.

articles.title: S. Korea's Purchase of Fighter under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Purchase of Fighter under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea staged one-by-one demonstration outside the building of the Defense Agency on June 13 in protest against the purchase of weapons for aggression which escalates the war atmosphere.
					 The organization said that the agency is mulling purchasing F-35 fighter which has not yet been tested for inferior efficiency in the U.S.
					
					 It denounced the agency's humiliating action for purchasing the U.S.-made fighter without testing it. 
					
					 It urged the authorities to stop at once the moves to buy weapons at huge expense of money collected from south Korean people as taxes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Given Publicity Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Given Publicity Abroad
						
Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea posted on its Internet homepage on June 12 the congratulatory speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations to mark the 66th anniversary of the KCU.
					He, in his speech made on June 6, 2012, expressed the firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the younger generation and future and indicated the tasks and ways for preparing the KCU members as reserves knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy who would shoulder upon themselves the future of the country and the nation.
					
					Meanwhile, the June 12 issue of La Prosperite of Democratic Congo carried the full text of his speech.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 13 posted on its website the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					 The work, made public on April 20, 2012, clarifies the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for the revolution and construction. It recalls that leader Kim Jong Il firmly upheld and protected the idea and cause of the President and wisely led the work to implement them.
					
					 The work also indicates tasks for firmly upholding and preserving the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and glorifying them for all ages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party Building Praised by Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party Building Praised by Romanian Political Party 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania posted an article on its website on June 5 to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The article titled "Event to be specially recorded in the history of the WPK" said Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to the party's unity in thought and purpose and made efforts to model the whole party on the revolutionary idea, the Juche idea of President Kim Il Sung from the very day he began his work at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il consolidated the WPK as firm as a rock to be an integral whole in ideology, organization and action that acts under the system of monolithic center, ideology and leadership, the article said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the unique Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism and thoroughly embodied it, protecting the country's sovereignty, dignity and socialism and performing great exploits for the global peace and security.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics, the DPRK could develop into a political and military power that no one dares to provoke and bring about a landmark phase in building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il steadily developed the WPK into an invincible party deeply rooted among the people and a mother party that formed a harmonious whole with the people.
					
					 The exploits Kim Jong Il made for strengthening the WPK are one of the precious legacies bequeathed by him to the country and its people and a foundation that guarantees the ever-lasting prospect and victory of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Noble Outlook on Future, Rising Generation Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Noble Outlook on Future, Rising Generation Praised Abroad 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing a congratulatory speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations to mark the 66th anniversary of the KCU, foreign political parties, organizations and institutions praised his noble outlook on the future and the rising generation.
					 The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute in their joint statement said: Kim Jong Un's congratulatory speech fully reflected his noblest outlook on the future and the rising generation based on the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and the Songun politics pursued by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Bolivia-DPRK Friendship Association noted: The DPRK is the most popular socialist country which spares nothing for the future of children. The congratulatory speech of Kim Jong Un and the recent celebrations of the KCU anniversary made us optimistic about the bright future of the DPRK.
					
					 The Kim Jong Il Library in Ecuador and the Ecuadorian Group of the Young Soldiers of Juche in their joint statement said that the congratulatory speech of Kim Jong Un is a historic declaration made to the whole world that Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's great outlook on the future and the rising generation whereby they loved and valued children most is being successfully and invariably carried forward in the era of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in a statement said that the Korean Children's Union would successfully carry out its mission and role under the leadership of Kim Jong Un in the future, too.
					
					 The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea said that the world was touched at the noble virtues of Kim Jong Un, who made an important speech so that the children might grow up stoutly, regarding them as the precious treasures responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 It fully supported his congratulatory speech, expressing firm belief that the children of the DPRK would grow up to be reserves for accomplishing the Juche-oriented cause of socialism and national reunification.

articles.title: Anniversary of Pochonbo Battle Observed by British Organizations
articles.content:
Anniversary of Pochonbo Battle Observed by British Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 4 on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Pochonbo Battle in Korea.
					 The victory in the Pochonbo Battle is an unprecedented political and military feat performed by the Korean People's Revolutionary Army under the command of President Kim Il Sung, a gifted strategist and invincible and iron-willed commander, the statement said.
					
					 The advance of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the homeland in June 1937 was a military operation of great political significance, it noted, and continued:
					
					 At the end of the battle the President made a historic speech which instilled the conviction of victory into people and aroused them to the struggle to crush Japanese imperialism and liberate Korea.
					
					 Indeed, the flames which raged in Pochonbo was a bright beacon indicating the way of defeating Japanese imperialism and building a new world of the people free from exploitation and oppression in Korea and the victory in the battle was a great banner inspiring the world's oppressed people in their struggle for independence and sovereignty.
					
					 The torch brightly lit over Pochonbo 75 years ago is still burning in Songun Korea dynamically advancing along the road of the anti-imperialist struggle under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, it concluded.

articles.title: PTC es el Estado Mayor de la revolucion del Songun
articles.content:
PTC es el Estado Mayor de la revolucion del Songun
						
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- Hoy es dia significativo en que se celebra el 48o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El fortalecio el PTC como Estado Mayor de la revolucion del Songun y elevo considerablemente su papel directriz.
					
					Dio el primer paso de su guia sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun al inspeccionar el 25 de agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Formulo la politica de Songun como principal modo politico del socialismo y metodo de direccion revolucionaria del partido, a base del analisis profundo de la situacion creada y la demanda del desarrollo de la revolucion en la decada de 1990.
					
					Hizo establecer en todo el ejercito el sistema de direccion del partido y logro nuevo viraje en transformar el EPC como ejercito del partido, el lider y la revolucion.
					
					Presento el EPC como pilar y grueso de la revolucion y lo convirtio en las poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del monte Paektu que apoyan fielmente en la delantera al partido.
					
					Igualmente, hizo del EPC las fuerzas politico-militares que cumplen bien el papel protagonico en la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					Oriento el trabajo y las actividades de las organizaciones del partido de distintos niveles a materializar la idea del Songun y la linea de la revolucion de igual nombre.
					
					Instruyo a ellas registrar cambios en el modo de trabajo aprendiendo el ejemplo de las emprendedoras y frescas labores politicas del partido que se desarrollan en el seno del EPC.
					
					De esta manera, el PTC se transformo como el combativo que sale siempre victorioso con la garantia militar y lucha con el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					Se consolido mas la unidad monolitica entre el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion y la RPDC llego a ser digna potencia militar con armas nucleares.
					
					Las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien sento el ejemplo de la construccion del partido socialista en el poder, brillan como patrimonio eterno de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: PTC se responsabiliza por el destino de masas populares
articles.content:
PTC se responsabiliza por el destino de masas populares
						
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- Hoy se cumplen 48 anos desde que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il comenzo a trabajar en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Desde entonces, el trabajo incansablemente para construir el PTC como partido-madre que se responsabilizara consecuentemente por el destino de las masas populares.
					
					Combino correctamente la direccion unica del partido con su linea de las masas populares considerando el establecimiento de la unidad con estas como uno de los importantes principios de la construccion y trabajo del partido y problema vital para este.
					
					Instruyo a los funcionarios saber bien y realizar lo que piensan amplias masas populares, defender sus intereses y trabajar como servidores abnegados de ellas.
					
					Gracias al partido que con su politica abarcadora y de beneficios populares, resuelve los problemas que angustian a las personas y las conduce al futuro radiante, todos los trabajadores viven dignamente participando en la vida politica estatal y militando en esa organizacion politica o las de masas.
					
					El calido amor del PTC y los beneficios de sus politicas populares llegan a todas las familias y personas que confian ahora su destino en esa organizacion.
					
					Bajo la sabia orientacion del PTC, que resuelve todos los problemas apoyandose en el pueblo, se hicieron los populares el ejercito y el poder y sucede lo mismo en la economia y la cultura.
					
					Todos los uniformados y civiles, unidos monoliticamente en torno al PTC, crean grandes milagros en la construccion de Estado prospero socialista siguiendo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Se ofrecen funciones de musica y danza por 19 de junio
articles.content:
Se ofrecen funciones de musica y danza por 19 de junio
						
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 48o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Conjunto Artistico Mansudae ofrecio hoy en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este una funcion de musica y danza.
					La funcion comenzo con el solo femenino y coro "Al camarada Kim Jong Il".
					
					En la escena se pusieron distintas piezas, entre otras, el coro "El partido es el regazo del General", el duo mixto "Pais lleno de benevolencia del partido", el concierto de instrumentos de mujeres "El recuerdo del camino hacia frente", el cuarteto masculino "Llamea, la hoguera" y el coro femenino "No tiene fin la anoranza".
					
					Los ejecutantes encomiaron las hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien desde el primer periodo de su trabajo en el CC del PTC, oriento esta organizacion politica por el unico camino victorioso mediante destacadas actividades ideo-teoricas y la direccion energica.
					
					El concierto llego al climax junto con la interpretacion del coro "Kim Jong Il siempre esta vivo como el Sol".
					
					El duo mixto y coro "Nuestro dirigente estimado por el pueblo" y el coro "Le seguiremos con la unica alma" mostraron bien el gran orgullo y dignidad de todos los uniformados y civiles coreanos de enaltecer a Kim Jong Un, igual al Dirigente         Kim Jong Il, en el puesto cimero del PTC y la revolucion.
					
					La vieron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y Choe Ryong Hae, miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, las entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, y los demas trabajadores de esta capital.
					
					Por otra parte, tuvieron lugar en el Teatro del Pueblo, el Teatro Nacional de Drama, etc. las funciones de las entidades centrales artisticas, tales como la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional, el Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional, el grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil y el Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang. 
					
					En las provincias se efectuaron tambien las funciones de las entidades artisticas locales.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza campana mediatica anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza campana mediatica anti-RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el periodico surcoreano Chosun Ilbo reporto que "el Norte (de Corea) importo a precios baratos los uniformes militares" atribuyendolo a los gastos de las festividades del 100o Dia del Sol (15 de abril, fecha de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung).
					  Yonhap News censuro tambien la politica para las generaciones venideras de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea describiendo su version como "opinion" de un pais tercero.
					
					  Por otra parte, Maeil Kyongje calumnio a la RPDC haciendose eco de un articulo referente al encuentro de familiares y parientes que viven separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea, el cual fue manipulado y publicado por un medio de prensa administrado por los traidores a la patria.
					
					  Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este martes un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					  No se puede perdonar que los medios conservadores surcoreanos continuen provocando a la RPDC y agraven las relaciones N-S publicando sus desinformaciones a instigacion de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Eso forma parte de la campana en busca del enfrentamiento de regimenes del Norte y el Sur, que lanzan ferozmente ahora los compinches del traidor Lee, siendo un acto malsano para corroer el regimen socialista y la unidad monolitica de la RPDC y envenenar el clima de reunificacion en alianza con el Norte, dado en  distintos sectores del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Es muy ridiculo que Lee Myung Bak, empantanado ahora en atolladero por dentro y por fuera, intentara buscar la salvacion distrayendo la mirada de la poblacion con las desinformaciones de ese tipo.
					
					  La RPDC expuso en claro su posicion rotunda de destruir implacablemente los focos de provocadores de peor calana que se dedican a difamar la maxima dignidad, la idea, el regimen y el pueblo de la RPDC urdiendo complots de toda indole.
					
					  Los medios conservadores surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia reflexionando seriamente de las consecuencias que emanen de su repetida demagogia anti-RPDC.
